name: A Quick Journey to the Edge and Back
name_original: A Quick Journey to the Edge and Back
description:
PHOTOSENSITIVTY WARNING

THIS GAME CONTAINS EXTREME FLASHING LIGHTS.

After the mysterious death of your father in his workshop, you discover what he's truly been working on all this time, and use this to travel to The Edge; the place beyond life. 

Meet dangerous Gods, people from your father's past and many other restless souls.

The world around you is not what it seems, with multiple endings; who you trust will change the fate of both yourself and your Father. 

Key features:

  • Intriguing mystery that unfolds over the game and has multiple endings
  • 1-Bit art
  • Unique spins on platforming, with new elements been introduced over each level
  • A Cinematic journey with flashbacks
  •  Boss fights - Challenge the Gods that stand in your way
